name: cesto-ai
description: AI-driven food & beverage platform connecting buyers and suppliers

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../ai-services && pip install -r requirements.txt

author: Cesto AI Team
